Love these pants.  Not sure if I'm going to wear the strings or not.  I could've gone with a size smaller.  I'm 190lbs , 5'3" and usually wear a size 12 pants.  I ordered a L.  The waist has some give so a size M would've worked too.  I'm going to see how they hold up once I wash them.

I ordered a large and they still fit snug. They have very little stretch. The pants themselves were beautiful. The orange was bright, just like the picture,  and they matched my top perfectly. I thought they would be a little loose, but the fit like leggings at the top, and loose from the calf down. I’m 5’9”, 165lbs, 31” waist, 41” hips, and they hit at the top of my ankles. I wore combat boots so it hid that they were a little too short. The fabric is this thin, so the pants are good for spring and cool summer day/night.
